posts.post_content:
Thanks to everyone that has helped me so far!

Scott

Wow Scott,

You're getting really close!  I'm excited for you.

Rob
Thanks for the kind words Rob. I'm pumped too. After I get these 8 I'll decide on Demmitt and O'Hara. I'm pretty sure I'll go for them and then call it a day.

Hi Scott,

I completed my T206 set fairly recently and have decided (for the time being) not to go for the Demmitt and O'Hara.  I think they're a bit overpriced for how many of them are out there.  If I had them both I'd probably change my mind on how rare they are though.  ;)

Good luck on the final stretch!

email sent on young scott
larry
Want to start a caramel set bump!
The I will drive to your house and cook you Thanksgiving dinner if you sell me one of these cards bump.

Scott,

I would consider selling my starter e90 set.  It is on the SGC registry and it's about 41 cards about 35% of the set in low to mid grade.  Most cards have nice eye appeal and are centered pretty well.  You can see it here

[url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=250&userset=1174[/url]

or its called Gallo's 1909 American Caramel.  Feel free to make an offer.

Thanks

James G

James

Thank you for the kind offer but at this point I'm committed to finishing up the T206's before I start anything else.

Thank you again.

Scott

Scott, 

I've been watching your progress for sometime and wish you the best of luck on the remaining cards and early kudos on the set coming to an end.

Tim
